recipe.notes: **UNTRIED**   Southern-style Pecan Pie is the thing I like second-most in the world.  Sweet Potato Pecan Pie is number  one, but this  isn't a recipe for that, is it now?  Hush and be happy.
recipe.name: Southern Pecan Pie
recipe.preparation: Beat eggs slightly.  Mix in white syrup, sugar, oleo, vanilla and salt. Add pecans.  Bake at 400F for 15 minutes and at 350F for 30 to 35 minutes.**I think Oleo = Margarine for us Yankees, close enough.
